data.name: Zombie Army 4: Blowtorch Weapon Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Hell just got a little bit hotter! It’s always a good idea to have a blowtorch to hand – not only is this lightweight little burner useful for melting zombie faces, but it’ll also help you avoid a nasty surprise at the end of a crème brûlée recipe.
This Weapon Bundle contains:
- Blowtorch
- 2 Charms (Dragon Egg + Cracked Pressure Gauge)
- 2 Weapon Skins (Painted like a Dragon + Brass)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
